answerText: CP violation [or charge conjuation-parity symmetry violation][10] CP violation is one of Sakharov's conditions for baryogenesis, which may explain why this substance is rarely seen in the universe. It is the opposite of matter.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 2 | 18 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this phenomenon in which decay via the weak force does not conserve the symmetry between the two namesake quantities.
